title: Camille Intro Music Download?
body: As the title suggests, is there a chance we may be able to download a HQ version of Camille's intro music, or is there already and I'm just unable to find it?

replies.body:
Hi Judge Wapner!!

Camille's login theme is now on our [Soundcloud page](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/camille-the-steel-shadow). You can download the mp3 (44.1kHz 320kbps) from there directly.

> [{quoted}](name=Chemicalseb,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Zr29lRde,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-14T01:18:15.808+0000)
>
> Hi Judge Wapner!!
> 
> Camille's login theme is now on our [Soundcloud page](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/camille-the-steel-shadow). You can download the mp3 (44.1kHz 320kbps) from there directly.

hey i just wanted to say to the guys who produce the music(composer to orchestra) that i love you guys and keep up the amazing work you do! I always listen to your music and it makes me happy to hear the next piece you guys do!

Thank you so much, Treeofwar!

The rest of music team and I really appreciate it :)
Most of the music gets put up on our [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends), and you can download the songs there. Camille's is there now too!

Hi all ! 
and hi the League Music Team.

I would like to ask you: will you upload a new album on your Spotify account, with all the last login screen music soon?
Because I love your last compositions and I think it will be great to hear it between a Drake and a Chainsmoker ahah !!! :)

Keep doing master piece like that !

:)

Oh, awesome, thanks! I've brought the music up to other players during play and it's pretty unanimous about how great it is. There are hours-long replay loops on youtube too. I left the login menu open just to have it play while I worked on things (hence the question about being able to download it). Pretty fantastic stuff.
